item.title: How to Test Google Polymer elements on Travis CI
item.description: Problem: how do you design a cloud-based continuous integration pipeline if your automated application tests relies on technology that requires a GUI, or an actual web browser? Google Polymer heavily leverages Shadow DOM, a feature that’s not currently supported in headless JavaScript environments like PhantomJS. My polymer-testing-box demonstrate how to run such tests via Xvfb on a headless Ubuntu VM. Can this technique be used on Travis CI? Travis CI supports Xvfb and Firefox.
